nodes.text: The Ongidae were a sentient species that lived in the galaxy. Pemmin Brunce was an Ongidae who worked as the head of security in the Canto Bight casino on Cantonica.
Ongidae were strong and disciplined, which made them ideal foot-soldiers.
Although the Galactic Empire rarely enlisted non-humans, they did make use of Ongidae Oppressors.
